name: Glare1more
description: Glare is a word entry type of game. Aim to clear it by inputting words or phrases found during conversation.. Glare 1more is a remake of the free game, Glare 1, and includes a bonus scenario. If you enter the correct words and phrase during Glare’s conversation the story will advance.
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows 7 Процессор: Pentium4 Оперативная память: 1 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: Intel HD Место на диске: 250 MB Дополнительно: WindowsXP impossible
